attributes.action: To put ‘come fly with me’ and ‘little Britain’ back on Netflix and BBC iplayer
attributes.additional_details:
So these 2 British sitcoms have been removed from Netflix and BBC iPlayer today and the uk loved it it made people laugh and there was a joke about a black person in both sitcoms but these weren’t made to be racist so please could we have these 2 back on Netflix and BBC iPlayer.

Thank you
attributes.background: To bring back ‘come fly with me’ and ‘little Britain’ on Netflix and BBC iPlayer

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This would be a decision for Netflix.
